name: Friday Night Funkin' VS Polygon (Beta 2)
description:
So you challenged Polygon in a rap battle..do you think you have what it takes to beat him?

well no. you don't.

Also, this game is just another beta. there is WAY MORE TO COME.

also please send feedback (will accept anything from bugs in the game or just the game in general.) that would help a lot! thanks!
